overview: El Bizco has his hair cut by scissors, a notorious sight loss, he inherited from his father the passion for the Torinos and for the cumbia group Los Wawancó. El Bizco works in the tapestry of Giménez, an old man who mistreats him. One day an old comrade of his father's adventures appears with a green Torino, the car that will change his life.
title: Historias breves V: Toro verde
